I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
my favorite music is rock and roll.
i write children s books.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going so far?
It's going well! Just got out of work and about to go home. How about you?
It's going pretty well, thanks for asking! I'm just hanging out at home, watching some TV.
I'm watching a cooking show. I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
Haha, I feel the same way! I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it either.
Well, we can always learn together!
That's a great idea! I'd love to learn how to cook better.
Awesome! We can start by watching some cooking shows together and then we can try to make some of the recipes.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It will be! And we can also share our favorite recipes with each other.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited to start cooking together.
